message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, a chain of ancestors and descendants can be traced from Kathryn to Steven. Specifically, Kathryn is an ancestor of Kelly, and through a series of relationships involving Albert, Brittany, Joan, Donald, Kayla, Vincent, Megan, Brandon, Jean, Pamela, Edward, Nicholas, Stephanie, Kyle, Gabriel, Helen, Natalie, Elijah, Betty, Jerry, William, Abigail, Russell, Theresa, Jonathan, Christian, Charles, Amber, Beverly, Debra, Lawrence, Nicole, Dorothy, Dennis, Carolyn, Jack, Samantha, Wayne, Joe, Michelle, Gerald, Joyce, Christine, Samuel, Andrew, Emma, Charlotte, Ashley, Jacqueline, Terry, Cheryl, Roy, Kimberly, James, Cynthia, Bradley, Judith, David, Janet, Ethan, and Christina, Kathryn is ultimately an ancestor of Steven. Therefore, Kathryn is Steven's ancestor.

<ANSWER>3</ANSWER>
